Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. you've received the \\\"Welcome to EPAM\\\" email, so you already know where and at what time your first EPAM day \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"where you'll be invited to fill in some documents and sign NDA.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After that, you'll meet your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HR specialist\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" from People Management Team - whose aim is to help you integrate into EPAM and provide you informational support during the probation period. You'll have a brief introduction to EPAM, it's internal tools, rules and will be proposed to have a short office tour.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The final step for your first day is to meet your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager via Microsoft Teams and team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Get your equipment at IT Infrastructure Support Engineer – floor 5, room 518, get acquainted with your first tasks and enjoy being part of the global EPAM team.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":5815,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8/duo.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8/duo.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"duo.PNG\",\"name\":\"duo.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":877,\"height\":60},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
